mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Place( uidx, category, placeName, placeDetail, guide, tag, placeImg, address, option1, option2, availableTime, intervalTime, price )VALUES( #{uidx}, #{category}, #{placeName}, #{placeDetail}, #{guide}, #{tag}, #{placeImg}, #{address}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{availTimeValue}, #{intervalTime}, #{price} )
